hippodrome

Class RacingTrack

  • java.lang.Object
    • hippodrome.RacingTrack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RacingTrackInterface, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RacingTrack
extends java.lang.Object
implements RacingTrackInterface
    Place where the races take place. Here each race is represented by an element of the class Race, described by a given number of tracks, an identification and a distance.
    Since:
    0.1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      RacingTrack(GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface repository, Race race)
      Creates a Racing Track.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RacingTrack

        public RacingTrack(GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface repository,
                   Race race)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a Racing Track.
        This constructor creates a Racing Track giving a race. Plus, an instance of the repository is also given in order to report status changes on the course of its actions.
        Parameters:
        race - A race to be executed over this Racing Track.
        repository - an instance of a GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface in order to report all the actions and log each and every moment.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a illegal argument is sent.

    • Method Detail

      • proceedToStartLine

        public void proceedToStartLine(int horseJockeyId)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Changes the state of the pair Horse/Jockey to At the Start Line (ATSL) and waits till the last startTheRace() is performed by the Entities.
        Specified by:
        proceedToStartLine in interface RacingTrackInterface
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the wait() is interrupted.

      • makeAMove

        public Response makeAMove(int horseId,
                          int ability)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Let a pair Horse/Jockey horse make a move on the track, accordingly to its abilities to move.
        This methods waits till the makeAMove(int, int) of the last pair Horse/Jockey. Plus, it also notifies when the first pair Horse/Jockey has crossed the finish line.
        Specified by:
        makeAMove in interface RacingTrackInterface
        Parameters:
        horseId - the identification of the pair Horse/Jockey which wants to make a move.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the wait() is interrupted.

      • hasFinishLineBeenCrossed

        public boolean hasFinishLineBeenCrossed(int horseJockeyId)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Verification if the pair Horse/Jockey horse has crossed the finish line.
        This method reset the condition variable of proceedToStartLine(int).
        Specified by:
        hasFinishLineBeenCrossed in interface RacingTrackInterface
        Parameters:
        horseJockeyId - the pair Horse/Jockey which we want to verify if had crossed the finish line.
        Returns:
        true if the pair Horse/Jockey had crossed the finish line; otherwise it will return false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • startTheRace

        public void startTheRace()
        Signal that the race is about to start, by the Broker performing its job.
        Note that this method changes the value of the condition variable to the proceedToStartLine(int) wait condition, notifying its changes.
        Specified by:
        startTheRace in interface RacingTrackInterface

      • getRace

        public Race getRace()
        Gets the current Race happening on this Racing Track.
        Specified by:
        getRace in interface RacingTrackInterface
        Returns:
        the Race of this Racing Track.

      • getWinner

        public int getWinner()
        Gets the current winner of a race on this Racing Track.
        Specified by:
        getWinner in interface RacingTrackInterface
        Returns:
        the current winner as the identification of a pair Horse/Jockey; otherwise -1 if the race is not over yet.

      • getOut

        public void getOut()
        Specified by:
        getOut in interface RacingTrackInterface

      • setRace

        public void setRace(Race race)

        Set a new Race instance.
        Specified by:
        setRace in interface RacingTrackInterface
        Parameters:
        race - the new Race.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the communication channel is busy and cannot be open.

      • getNumberOfEntitiesDeclaringExit

        public int getNumberOfEntitiesDeclaringExit()
        Gives the number of entities running on this hippodrome region which will exit the simulation.
        Specified by:
        getNumberOfEntitiesDeclaringExit in interface RacingTrackInterface
        Returns:
        the number of entities which declares death.
